title: At level 17, I have 9850 essence.
body:
There are like two dozen different champions that look interesting to me, but nearly all of them cost 4800/6300 essence because the champions below those prices are largely uninteresting by comparison _(particularly ADCs, why are basically all the actually interesting ADCs 4800 or more)_.

Riot's pre-30 earnings chart shows that I'll have a total of 20312 essence by level 30, give or take a couple hundred once they add some essence to the First Win bonus. Which only puts a small dent in the number of champions I actually want to play.

There's the free rotation, but you can't earn chests with free champions, and with the system how it is now, you really want to be earning as much loot as possible to actually unlock things before the heat death of the universe.
